title: MDG5.B: Share of pregnant women receiving adequate antenatal care
subtitle: Millennium Development Goal (MDG) 5.B was the share of pregnant women in developing regions receiving adequate antenatal care (which is defined as at least 4 antenatal visits). The target was to achieve universal antenatal care for pregnant women by 2015. This target was not achieved.

comparisonLines.label: Target: Universal antenatal care for pregnant women by 2015
